Row.Text: A district placed once per city to balance food and production. Placed adjecent to the city center to boost [ICON_Food] Food yelds, place away from the city center to boost [ICON_Production] Production yelds
+{1_num} [ICON_Production] Production from placed distant to the City Center.
{1_num: number +#,###;-#,###} [ICON_Production] Production from the adjecent City Center.
+{1_num} [ICON_Food] Food from the adjecent City Center.
+{1_num} [ICON_Food] Food from the adjecent Entertainment Complex.
+{1_num} [ICON_Food] Food from the adjecent Commercial Hub.
